metadata.dc:author: Ramírez Ponferrada, R
Dávila Morillo, A
Moreno Torres, A
Solís García, E
Castilla Pérez-Navarro, J M
Gallardo Avila, A
metadata.dc:description: We present a case of lymphoepithelioma of the larynx, a very rare tumour in this location. The relationship between lymphoepithelial carcinoma of the larynx and Epstein-Barr virus, is still controversial. We describe one new case of this tumour involving the supraglottis, and it's surgery and radioterapic treatment. The diagnostic problems and therapy associated with this rare tumour are discussed.
metadata.dc:title: Carcinoma linfoepitelial de laringe. Aportación de un nuevo caso.
[Larynx lymphoepithelioma].
